ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Susan Watson for editing the manuscript, Yoshihiro Kawaoka (University of Wisconsinâ€”Madison) for the gift of the pCAGGS vector, Changjiang Weng (Harbin Veterinary Research Institute) for providing the ISRE-Luc reporter plasmid, and Ronghong Hua (Harbin Veterinary Research Institute) for providing the BiFC reporter plasmid.

This work was supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2016YFD0500205), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) (31521005, 31672582, 31422054, 31472215, and 31902260), and the China Agriculture Research System (CARS-41-G12).
